Contact.description: Details about the contact associated with the transaction.

LineItems.description: List of line items in the transaction.

BankAccount.description: The bank account associated with the transaction.

IsReconciled.description: Indicates if the transaction is reconciled.

Date.description: The date and time of the transaction.

DateString.description: The formatted date of the transaction.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code for the transaction.

CurrencyRate.description: The exchange rate at the time of the transaction.

LineAmountTypes.description: Types of line amounts in the transaction.

SubTotal.description: The subtotal amount for the transaction.

TotalTax.description: The total tax amount for the transaction.

Total.description: The total amount for the transaction.

BankTransactionID.description: The unique identifier for the bank transaction.

PrepaymentID.description: The ID for prepayment associated with the transaction.

OverpaymentID.description: The ID for overpayment associated with the transaction.

UpdatedDateUTC.description: The last updated date and time in UTC.

HasAttachments.description: Indicates if the transaction has attachments.

ExternalLinkProviderName.description: Name of the external link provider for the transaction.
